description.value: Teaching is a difficult art form, but you've gotten a pretty good handle on it. When you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Craft] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Earn Income] during downtime, you can also attempt to Aid another creature doing the same with the same skill if they have a lower proficiency bonus than you. If you succeed, they can use the better result between your check and their own check.
